reviews.sentence: Not a bad stay just a few minor gliches. Overall it was nice. Had some partying neighbors but they stopped at midnight. Started again at 5 am next morning when they were leaving. Then when we left of the two elevators one was out of service and the other one was running real slow. We could not have taken the stairs but we were on the 11th floor. had a small child and a couple elderly people in our group. One of the employees who was coming out of the service elevator told us we could use that elevator so we finally were able to make it to the lobby.

No a good stay. Went to the Sheraton for a Bachelorette party. We told the hotel when booking it was a Bachelorette party. Our rooms wete not ready when we checked in at 5 pm. we were told the hroup that stayed in the rooms the night before had partied to hard finaly our rooms ate ready. We go out for the evening come back to our rooms around 130 am. We are dtil celebrating and a women from security walks into our room. she does nt knock on tbe door. no calls is before hand. she just walks into our room and informs us thst the party is over we were very polite to her and her we were sorry. She leaves. I walk out into the hall to go to the other room and the security women is in the hallway we make eye contact i go back i to the room. she again comes in with out knocking. She then informs us that we r still to loud and tell us that we must go to sleep or she will call the police. Mind y i u it has been less then 5 mins s8nce she left the first time and she obviously did nt get a second noise complaint because she was in the hall. Look I do notmi d being told to be quite I understand there are other guest on the hotel. What I do mind is a hotel staff member walking into my room without knocking being rude to me when I am being polite treating me like a child and telling me togo to bed and threatening to call police if i do not go to bed.

Steer clear. I would not recommend staying at this hotel especially when busy. Rooms were dirty pretty sure sheets were never changed smelled of awful cologne and felt dirty. Air conditioner did not blow cold thermostat was totally wrong. Bathrooms were small and no tubs in premises so I was told. There was crusty debris inside and on the exterior of shower. Elevators are extremely slow and very small we waited about 15 20minutes to get down from 14th floor. Would have taken stairs but wife is 8 months pregnant. I was told I was booked and payed for club level floor when arrived they were full. When I went to my room and it was bathtub less went back to front desk and a room appeared on the club level floor that I payed for but still not bathtub. Our keys did not work so had to return to front desk again for a 3rd time. Staff was friendly only decent part about the stay. Hotel had an unpleasant and dirty smell. Would not recommend this property at all.

We traveled down for the fourth of July weekend with our kids. Lorna Dune the manager on duty was wonderful with our kids and very acomodating. We could not find any open restaurants near so we ended up spending some time with our family in the hotel lobby bar area. Had a wonderful dinner the tuna appetizer was delicious. while the kids played and we all visited. It was a very memorable holiday.
It was old and musty. Not at all like the website depicted. The elevators took FOREVER to go up and down and only one set.

The lodgings are very average room size not especially large beds not especially soft amentities not especially present. I have not had much interaction with any of the staff yet so I can not speak to their politeness and helpfulness besides the breakfast crew which checks both boxes. On that note the breakfast is fantastic. I would not recommend it but I would not discourage a nights stay.
The elevators are stupid slow and the staff is slow to respond to requests. Parking structure needs work and the gates do not work properly.

Exceeds Expectations. Had a one nighter over a weekend to attend a family gathering arriving early evening. The facilities are a little tired and are in need of some modern refreshing – and one of two guest elevators were out of service. However the facility was clean and smelled fresh as well. The staff made up for all the short comings with their helpfulness and friendly attitude. Price was right and the neighborhood is safe for jogging. Will be back.

Much Improvement needed to meet Starwod Standards. Stayed at Clayton in Nov 2016. I am a frequent traveler cause of work. Clayton Sheraton needs much improvement in terms of cleanliness hallway carpets were stained and had bad odor. Room carpet was stained no smell though. Air filters in the room seems like were not changed for more than a year. Fitness equipment seems like was never cleaned and same with the floor. I hope Starwod management pays attention to the basic upkeep of the facility and try to improve this facility.
Overall it is a nice hotel. Good bar good restaurant. Nice pool. No Fridge in the room. The elevator was also incredibly slow but we just happened to be there during a renovation time.

Good choice if you are staying in Clayton. Clayton is a bit odd with its 70s vintage concrete office towers which seems odd to someone from the East Coast. The Sheraton is a nice property in the middle of all that. The staff is very friendly and the facilities clean and reasonable. I had probably ask for a higher floor next time. The staff in the lobt bar were very friendly. The food was average not great.
Hotel lobby was beautiful. Very small rooms.
Went to the Sheraton Clayton Plaza Hotel for a business seminar. Everything from parking to finding the event to accommodations for the event were straightforward and well served.

STL trip. This hotel is in a good location in Clayton. Mo Lots of food and beverage options nearby. Hotel lobby is nice and clean but the rooms need a little TLC. My lamp clock refrigerator were all unplugged. The workout room had no usable bike and 2 of 3 treadmills were inop. The bar service in the evenings was miserable. One elderly server who could not keep up with about 10 people watching Thursday night football. The front desk ladies were nice after I asked them to slow down the verbiage and repeat what they just said. Overall I WOULD NOT STAY HERE ON MY OWN DIME.
Lovely hotel quiet with comfortable beds. Plenty of charging ports. Excellent staff. Very large pool and fitness area. Excellent choice of toiletries. Paid WiFi no refrigerator in room.
Great venue for wedding reception.

Good all around hotel. Convenient location. The hotel lobby is very nice and as an upscale feel and although the hotel has been a round for a while the lobby looks new. The room was also nice but small. The bed was extremely comfortable. I spelt like a baby. The bathroom was tiny. So small in fact that the door had to open out not in. The shower was nice but the head leaked and sprayed all over the sink. i was disapointed that there was not refrigerator or safe int eh room. The carpet in the hotel needs to be replaced everywhere but the lobby. It is filthy and stained in the rooms hallways and club lounge. The Club Lounge is nice and had a decent spread for snakes. Its certainly not a meal replacement but a good place to get a can of pop if the fridge is strolled or an apple. I ’m not sure though if it is worth the money.

To be fair I stopped by to see the hotel to possibly stay at a later date. Saw beautiful lobby and nice outdoor pool. Will stay here next time I am in Clayton for the night. Prices reasonable. Nice part of town.

Bed was comfortable. View was beautiful and location was safe and great. Access to a bar and food late was great. Bathroom was upgraded and nice. Complimentary water bottles nice touch. The lid on our ice bucket had dried good on it do not cleaned from previous guests. Carpet was stained and looked dirty. No microwave or refrigerator in room for our left over dinner. For this caliber of a hotel I expected excellence and all amenities to be accessible. Can not give you an excellent.
It was a nice conference facility nice to have a bar restaurant on site internet connection was quick and reliable food was about average fairly priced but not exceptional.
